Package com.madrobot.ui.widgets

A whole lotta Custom UI Widgets.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColorPickerView.OnColorChangedListener
    Listener for notifying color changed events.
    HorizontalScrollView.OnScrollListener
    Implement to receive events on scroll position and page snaps.
    JoystickView.JoystickClickedListener  
    JoystickView.JoystickMovedListener  
    SortableListView.DragListener
    Listener f
    SortableListView.DropListener
    A Drop listener informs when a item that needs to be sorted is dropped
    SortableListView.RemoveListener
    A RemoveListener recieves notifications when an item is removed from the list
    WheelView.OnWheelChangedListener
    Wheel changed listener interface.
    WheelView.OnWheelClickedListener
    Wheel clicked listener interface.
    WheelView.OnWheelScrollListener
    Wheel scrolled listener interface.
    ZoomableImageView.OnBitmapChangedListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorPickerView
    Displays a color picker to the user and allow them to select a color.
    CoverFlowGallery
    iPhone Style image gallery.
    CreditCardEditText
    An EditText that formats text like credit card numbers
    DashboardGauge  
    DashboardGridLayout
    Custom layout that arranges children in a grid-like manner, optimizing for even horizontal and vertical whitespace.
    EditTexts  
    EditTexts.CustomEditText<T>  
    EditTexts.FormattedEditText<T>  
    EditTexts.NumericFilter  
    EllipsizingTextView
    Workaround for an android bug.
    HorizontalScrollView
    A ViewGroup that arranges Views/ViewGroups horizontally.
    JoystickView
    Joystick view.
    PageCurlView
    A view that curls the end of the page.
    PhoneEditText
    EditText that formats the text entered like phone numbers
    SortableListView
    ListView that can be sorted using touch gestures.
    SVGImageView
    An ImageView that can also use SVG images as its source.
    VerticalTextView
    Vertical Text View component.
    WebImageView
    An image view that fetches its image off the web using the supplied URL.
    WeightedLinearLayout
    A special layout when measured in AT_MOST will take up a given percentage of the available space.
    WheelView
    iPhone style wheel based selector
    ZoomableImageView
    ImageView that can be zoomed with Pinch and double tap gestures

Package com.madrobot.ui.widgets Description

A whole lotta Custom UI Widgets.

The attribute set for each widget is named after the widget and is declared in the values/attrs.xml file
